Milt-
Yet another favor to ask. Since my computer is NOT coming out of the 
shop anytime soon, I need to get the word out on these books. My work 
email bounces when I try to post to Yahoo. Please post the following 
to the list:

Listeros-
Apologies for what is essentially commercial bandwidth...The Haynes 
books shipped on Monday, thank you for waiting so long. My "home" 
computer is out of service and email addresses out of reach. If you 
are waiting for an order of these books please contact me at:
helmt@...
Thanks all -t
